course_title: Oral History: Engaging with Living Subjects
course_description: This course discusses the historical antecedents and usage of history; the meaning of oral traditions for the study of history, and the ethics of oral history projects.
sections: Class Nbr: 4398, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: TTh 4-5:15p, Instructor: S. Ashmore, Status: Open
